body_html:
Happens to me as well.
I have installed CUDA8, CuDNN 5.1.
Any solutions?

EDIT:
I found this excellent guide:
https://nitishmutha.github.io/tensorflow/2017/01/22/TensorFlow-with-gpu-for-windows.html
solves my problem.

I have installed CUDA8, CuDNN 5.1.
